subject: Hockey, Ice
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Doug Weight, Bill Guerin, Peter Karmanos, Ron Mason and Cindy Curley will be inducted into the United States Hockey Hall of Fame in Eveleth, Minn.
snippet: Doug Weight, Bill Guerin, Peter Karmanos, Ron Mason and Cindy Curley will be inducted into the United States Hockey Hall of Fame in Eveleth, Minn.
